languages.text: {n}Мрачно и торжественно Соломон поднимает железную ладонь.{/n} "Я клянусь, что больше никогда не подниму против вас оружия. А если наши взгляды на Лекс Империалис вновь разойдутся, я приду и сообщу об этом, чтобы вы немедленно решили мою судьбу".

{n}In a grim and solemn gesture, Solomorne raises his iron hand.{/n} "I swear never again to take up arms against you. Should our views on the Lex Imperialis diverge once more, I will approach you myself, so that you may decide my fate without delay."
languages.original_text: {n}Мрачно и торжественно Соломон поднимает железную ладонь.{/n} "Я клянусь, что больше никогда не подниму против вас оружия. А если наши взгляды на Лекс Империалис вновь разойдутся, я приду и сообщу об этом, чтобы вы немедленно решили мою судьбу".

{n}In a grim and solemn gesture, Solomorne raises his iron hand.{/n} "I swear never again to take up arms against you. Should our views on the Lex Imperialis diverge once more, I will approach you myself, so that you may decide my fate without delay."

{n}In a grim and solemn gesture, Solomorne raises his iron hand.{/n} "I swear never again to take up arms against you. Should our views on the Lex Imperialis diverge once more, I will approach you myself, so that you may decide my fate without delay."

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは、重々しく厳かな仕草でその鉄の手を掲げた。{/n}「二度とあなたに刃を向けないことを誓います。もし再びレックス・インペリアに対する見解が食い違うようなことがあれば、私自身があなたのもとへ出向き、その場で裁きを仰ぎましょう」
languages.original_text: {n}In a grim and solemn gesture, Solomorne raises his iron hand.{/n} "I swear never again to take up arms against you. Should our views on the Lex Imperialis diverge once more, I will approach you myself, so that you may decide my fate without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは、重々しく厳かな仕草でその鉄の手を掲げた。{/n}「二度とあなたに刃を向けないことを誓います。もし再びレックス・インペリアに対する見解が食い違うようなことがあれば、私自身があなたのもとへ出向き、その場で裁きを仰ぎましょう」

languages.text: {n}In einer entschlossenen und feierlichen Geste hebt Solomorne seine Eisenhand.{/n} "Ich schwöre, nie wieder die Waffe gegen Euch zu erheben. Sollten unsere Ansichten bezüglich des Lex Imperia erneut differieren, werde ich mich direkt an Euch wenden, dami6t Ihr ohne Verzögerung über mein Schicksal entscheiden könnt."
languages.original_text: {n}In a grim and solemn gesture, Solomorne raises his iron hand.{/n} "I swear never again to take up arms against you. Should our views on the Lex Imperialis diverge once more, I will approach you myself, so that you may decide my fate without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}In einer entschlossenen und feierlichen Geste hebt Solomorne seine Eisenhand.{/n} "Ich schwöre, nie wieder die Waffe gegen Euch zu erheben. Sollten unsere Ansichten bezüglich des Lex Imperia erneut differieren, werde ich mich direkt an Euch wenden, dami6t Ihr ohne Verzögerung über mein Schicksal entscheiden könnt."

languages.text: {n}D'un geste solennel et assuré, Solomorne lève sa main d'acier.{/n} « Je vous jure de ne plus jamais brandir mon arme contre vous. Si nos visions concernant la Lex Imperialis devaient diverger une nouvelle fois, je vous le ferais savoir immédiatement afin que vous puissiez décider de mon sort. »
languages.original_text: {n}In a grim and solemn gesture, Solomorne raises his iron hand.{/n} "I swear never again to take up arms against you. Should our views on the Lex Imperialis diverge once more, I will approach you myself, so that you may decide my fate without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un geste solennel et assuré, Solomorne lève sa main d'acier.{/n} « Je vous jure de ne plus jamais brandir mon arme contre vous. Si nos visions concernant la Lex Imperialis devaient diverger une nouvelle fois, je vous le ferais savoir immédiatement afin que vous puissiez décider de mon sort. »

languages.text: {n}Solomorne levanta su mano de hierro en un gesto serio y solemne.{/n} «Juro que no volveré a tomar las armas contra usted. Si alguna vez nuestra opinión de la Lex Imperialis difiere de nuevo, yo mismo compareceré ante usted para que decida mi destino en el acto».
languages.original_text: {n}In a grim and solemn gesture, Solomorne raises his iron hand.{/n} "I swear never again to take up arms against you. Should our views on the Lex Imperialis diverge once more, I will approach you myself, so that you may decide my fate without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne levanta su mano de hierro en un gesto serio y solemne.{/n} «Juro que no volveré a tomar las armas contra usted. Si alguna vez nuestra opinión de la Lex Imperialis difiere de nuevo, yo mismo compareceré ante usted para que decida mi destino en el acto».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙举起了铁拳，充满了严峻、庄重的意味。{/n}“我在此发誓，我再也不会反对你的决定。如果我们对帝国律法的看法发生了分歧，我会亲自来到你面前，让你即刻决定我的命运。”
languages.original_text: {n}In a grim and solemn gesture, Solomorne raises his iron hand.{/n} "I swear never again to take up arms against you. Should our views on the Lex Imperialis diverge once more, I will approach you myself, so that you may decide my fate without delay."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙举起了铁拳，充满了严峻、庄重的意味。{/n}“我在此发誓，我再也不会反对你的决定。如果我们对帝国律法的看法发生了分歧，我会亲自来到你面前，让你即刻决定我的命运。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, sert ve ciddi bir tavırla demir elini kaldırıyor.{/n} "Bir daha asla size karşı silahlanmayacağıma yemin ederim. Lex İmperialis hakkındaki görüşlerimiz olur da tekrar ayrılırsa kaderime karar verebilmeniz adına hiç vakit kaybetmeden yanınıza geleceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}In a grim and solemn gesture, Solomorne raises his iron hand.{/n} "I swear never again to take up arms against you. Should our views on the Lex Imperialis diverge once more, I will approach you myself, so that you may decide my fate without delay."
